name: Nitroid
description:
Race through space destroying asteroids along the way to increase your score!

== CONTROLS ==

Arrow Keys - Move Ship

X - Shoot Laser

Z - Shift between Nitro and Normal Speed

Created with 💙 by:
Kishi Aeraki - https://aeraki.itch.io/
Asymmetric - https://asymmetric-garbage.itch.io/
CBMakes - https://cbmakes.itch.io/
